snippet: American Airlines and US Airways announce a $11 billion merger deal. | Time Warner is in early talks to shed much of Time Inc. | Federal prosecutors are closer to deciding whether to bring charges against a longtime portfolio manager at SAC Capital...
abstract: American Airlines and US Airways announce a $11 billion merger deal. | Time Warner is in early talks to shed much of Time Inc. | Federal prosecutors are closer to deciding whether to bring charges against a longtime portfolio manager at SAC Capital Advisors. | Anheuser-Busch InBev has revised its bid for Grupo Modelo.
